comment: nah, that's not all it does and quitting caffeine wouldn't be a substitute for it. For me, it gives me massive paranoia and I don't yawn or sleep for days. I got off of benzos earlier this year. I'm still trying to figure out how normal people sleep. Would be cool if I had a baseline sleep level to compare it to, but I don't. Anyway, Trazadone isn't worth the side effects.
amr:

Anyway, Trazadone isn't worth the side effects.

                  :ARG2 (ii2 / it)))
      :snt2 (a3 / and

      :snt3 (g2 / get-off-23

            :ARG2 (p2 / product

                        :op1 "Benzos"))
            :time (b / before)

                  :mod (t3 / this)))
      :snt4 (t4 / try-01
            :ARG0 ii5
            :ARG1 (f / figure-out-05
                  :ARG0 ii5
                  :ARG1 (t5 / thing
                        :manner-of (s2 / sleep-01
                              :ARG0 (p3 / person
                                    :ARG1-of (n2 / normal-02)))))
            :mod (s3 / still))
      :snt5 (c2 / cool-04
            :ARG1 (c3 / compare-01
                  :ARG0 ii5
